AbilityDef.label: summon anima tree
AbilityDef.description: Summons an anima tree at a location. The tree will be able to grow even if it's placed on stone flooring.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. You should still be able to interact with them like you could any other anima tree.

AbilityDef.label: summon polux tree
AbilityDef.description: Summons an polux tree at a location. The tree will be able to grow even if it's placed on stone flooring.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. It should still act as any other polux tree would though.

AbilityDef.label: summon enhanced corn
AbilityDef.description: Summons a super enhanced corn plant at a location. This plant will be able to grow even if it's placed on stone flooring, and will provide 10 times its normal yield.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. This issue should just be graphical though.

AbilityDef.label: summon enhanced devilstrand
AbilityDef.description: Summons a super enhanced devilstrand plant at a location. This plant will be able to grow even if it's placed on stone flooring, and will provide 10 times its normal yield.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. This issue should just be graphical though.

This issue should just be graphical though.

This issue should just be graphical though.

This issue should just be graphical though.

AbilityDef.label: summon enhanced nutrifungus
AbilityDef.description: Summons a super enhanced nutrifungus plant at a location. This plant will be able to grow even if it's placed on stone flooring, and will provide 10 times its normal yield.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. This issue should just be graphical though.

AbilityDef.label: summon enhanced toxipotato
AbilityDef.description:
Summons a super enhanced toxipotato plant at a location. This plant will be able to grow even if it's placed on stone flooring, and will provide 10 times its normal yield.

Despite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. This issue should just be graphical though.

WARNING: This plant still requires the ground to be toxic, and if it is not then the plant will immediately die.

AbilityDef.label: summon glow pod
AbilityDef.description: Summons a glow pod that lasts until it takes any amount of damage.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. This issue should just be graphical though.

AbilityDef.label: summon gauranlen pod
AbilityDef.description:
Summons a gauranlen pod at a location.

Despite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. This issue should just be graphical though.

WARNING: The pod will not spawn fully grown, and must be given an environment in which it can spend 5-6 days growing. Unlike normal summoned plants, the pod will be sensitive to fertility, so don't put it on stone.

AbilityDef.label: summon wood pillar
AbilityDef.description:
Summons a pillar of wood at a location that is so thick it requires a miner come to take it apart bit by bit.

This can be used as a method of getting wood without chopping down trees or planting something that gives wood.

WARNING: Using this on a location with a plant will destroy said plant. This is as expected.

AbilityDef.label: summon sandstone
AbilityDef.description: Summons a pillar of sandstone at a location. This stone will always give 9 chunks, and cannot be smoothed down.\n\nWARNING: Using this on a location with a plant will destroy said plant. This is as expected.

AbilityDef.label: summon granite
AbilityDef.description: Summons a pillar of granite at a location. This stone will always give 9 chunks, and cannot be smoothed down.\n\nWARNING: Using this on a location with a plant will destroy said plant. This is as expected.

AbilityDef.label: summon components
AbilityDef.description: Summons a pillar of useless stone with some components in it at a location.\n\nWARNING: Using this on a location with a plant will destroy said plant. This is as expected.

AbilityDef.label: summon advanced components
AbilityDef.description: Summons a pillar of useless stone with some advanced components in it at a location.\n\nWARNING: Using this on a location with a plant will destroy said plant. This is as expected.
